name: Achuk Barrage Launcher
customPrimary: Missiles have a random firing arc and make S-turns from launch to make it harder for PD weapons to lock on to it.

name: Sudarshan EMP Launcher
customPrimary: EMP delivery with top of the line anti-PD capability Missiles have a random firing arc, S-turns maneuver to target, Strips shields and then EMP on Hull

name: Vajra Engine Buster
customPrimary: Best in class Anti-Engine Missiles have a random firing arc and Heat seeking, adjusts target if lost.

name: Lakshya Anti-Fighter Launcher
customPrimary: Releases Accurate bursts of Anti-Fighter tracking Orbs. Useless against anything else.

name: Bhairav Heavy Torpedoes
customPrimary: High Damage and Impact Torpedo with an armored front for extra protection and penetration, S-turns maneuver to target, Strips shields and then EMP on Hull.

name: Trishul Hybrid Torpedoes
customPrimary: Torpedo has a limited maneuverability, Has a chance to bypass shields to EMP on Hull. Aim wide enough to hit back of target ship.

name: Dhwij Dual Cannon
customPrimary: Fires two rounds each per barrel in bursts, The projectile has smart capability, so it can track and maneuver towards the target within its forward arc.

name: Pinaka Point Defense Smart
customPrimary: Fires two rounds each per barrel in bursts, The projectile has smart capability, so it can track and maneuver towards the target within its forward arc.

name: Parashu Twin Mag Rail
customPrimary: Fires two rounds each per barrel in bursts, Extremely fast magnetically launched shell can wreak havoc on shields and electronics.

customAncillary: The specified sustained DPS value is achieved only when %s are installed. Without them, the sustained damage value is %s.
